website_summaries.verdict: These rugged sandals seem to be designed with non-stop summer fun in mind.
pros: Comfortable, supportive, adjustable and quick drying
Comes in a wide selection of colors including Amazon and Zappos exclusive colors
Patented Universal Strapping System with hook-and-loop straps
Non-marking Durabrasion rubber outsole for traction
cons: May run small, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for an active kid
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves these shoes! They fit as expected and she likes that she can adjust the ankles and toes straps. Great summer shoes! We have worn them running at the park and in the water. They are great shoes and worth the price! My kids are very active and she prefers these over her Keens. They are well made and I believe they will be very durable! I want a pair for myself now! ETA: They have lasted exceptionally well through our active Summer! She has started the school year wanting to wear them too! Easy to clean! Held up well an entire year and she's asking for another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey D

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: It was kinda tough to find my daughter's size in this color, but I'm so happy to have found them here! They arrived quickly. I had my daughter try them on before taking them off to make sure they'd fit. She wanted them back on again, so now she's running around our home in her new sandals! :) Slightly blurry photos attached because she didn't want to sit still lol.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Like Sandals Through the Hourglass...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my rough and tumble girl, as she loves to wear sandals and most little girl sandals are not the best for running/climbing. These were, however, way pricier than what I usually buy, particularly given how fast kids' feet grow. That being said, she absolutely loves them They aren't as long as we need, so her toes do overhang a bit. That's disappointing, but not Teva's fault. Since the Easter Bunny brought them, I can't exchange/return. She doesn't care. She's worn nothing since! I feel even with the sizing issue that we'll get our money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewToaKill

customer_reviews.title: Do not go by size in drop down box.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my two year old for an upcoming camping trip. The drop down box said the were available in size 5 toddler which is his size. Placed my order and when they arrived yesterday, they were clearly a size 5 youth. Huge. I love Teva's and have owned several pairs, so I wasn't disappointed in the product itself, but in the inaccurate size description. My kid was pumped about getting these and was devastated that he couldn't keep them (he's two, so it was a big deal to him). Hoping I can find him another pair in the right size, but will probably not be from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Snipes

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are easy for her to walk in
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves these! The color is true to the picture and it complements her skin tone very well. The shoes are easy for her to walk in. When I unboxed them, the Velcro was super new and hard to manage, even so, she has no problem dressing and undressing herself! So, I love them! The only thing, a mistake in my part; I didn't account for how much she would grow over the summer. I bought these just over a month ago and got them a size up from what she was then, should have done a size and a half (I just hope they last till August).
customer_reviews.author: Billie P

customer_reviews.title: I bought these in a big boy size 7. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a big boy size 7. I normally wear 8 in women’s, and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Broken on second day.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old boy plays hard, as most do. The second day of wearing these, a strap came loose from the footbed. Very disappointed in the quality of the Teva sandals over the last few years. I will not be purchasing any more. It seems they have made some bad cost cutting decisions that affect their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shoponlineonly

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong buying these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and my kids say very comfortable. The foot bed and straps have held up to an entire summer of beach, kayaking, and playground shenanigans! I love that the shoe provides great support for my little kiddos feet and that the end of the shoe extends just enough so there is no accidental toe stubbing.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are perfect for outdoor activities. My daughter wore these for a full day/night at Disney World without ever complaining about her feet hurting. She had only worn them one time before, so they didn't even need a good break-in time! They are sparkly and look great with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sunmom2

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I love that there are multiple points of adjustment to customize the sandal’s fit to your foot! We got these for our 9 year old son to wear for this summer. We are not disappointed at all with our purchase. He needed a pair of sandals that, if he went in a creek to explore, would not get pulled off in muck. We are very happy with these and we like the colors, too!
customer_reviews.author: Momtographer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! I bought the pink strawberry pattern
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I bought the pink strawberry pattern. I have a very small 2.5 year old who wears a 6.5/7 and has a very narrow foot. I sized down to a 6 and she still has about 3/4" at the toes. So these definitely run large. She walks around in them just fine and they actually fit her narrow foot quite well. Cheap flip flops are way too wide for her feet and barely stay on. These Tevas are well made and made to stay on toddler feet.
customer_reviews.author: Halina Fatina

customer_reviews.title: High quality sandal
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals! I am a Teva lover and wanted to get my 3 year old some for this summer. She's had them about a month and they are fantastic! I love that she can put them on herself (mostly) and that they have good traction. They seem comfortably fitted to her foot. I know that whatever the terrain, these will work. The only thing is they seem to run a little small, and narrow. She has very narrow feet so that is why they are so perfect for her, but if your child has wide feet I don't think they'd work.
customer_reviews.author: MaKenna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for very active and picky four year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a very busy four year old and is also VERY picky about how shoes feel on her feet. We both have been very happy with these sandals. I love the silver color, it is neutral but still a tad sparkly and fun. My daughter can easily put them on herself and they are comfortable on her feet right out of the box. She has zero tolerance for uncomfortable shoes! She occasionally will get a stray playground woodchip or pebble, but it seems to fall out quickly without having to take her shoe off.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: We buy them every year
customer_reviews.text: The whole family wears these sandals. They have rubber soles. Great for hiking and cmapimg. Swimming in them, creek wading. They are cute enough to wear everyday and not just for outdoor activities. Easy for little kids to put on. We only replace them because the kids feet get bigger. The velcro is strong . Straps adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS GOLD

customer_reviews.title: Rubs blister on toe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted so desperately to love her Teva sandals.... the only issue is where her little toe meets the fabric. My Teva's offer a padding that is soft, but these the strap is textured and rubs her little toe raw to the point of blistering. Re make the sandal and re send us a pair when you do!! Otherwise we have an un used pair of Tevas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Meg

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely love their Teva sandals
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love their Teva sandals. In fact they use them for all kinds of outdoor activity including some fairly physical activity. The sandals fit grade and wear very well. I was unable to find this product in our local store and was extremely happy to see them on Amazon. I was a little nervous purchasing them, because they're more expensive than the average sandal. Certainly worth the extra couple of bucks.
customer_reviews.author: 8621greg

customer_reviews.title: Adventures achieved in these great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals! We bought these for our toddler before traveling to Mexico. She happily wore them on the beach, swimming through cenotes, hiking and walking all over. The adjuster on both sets on straps (toe & ankle) are very helpful in maintaining a comfortable fit. The rubber sole has great traction and was thick enough to protect when walking over rough terrain and sharper rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered the Teva Tidepool sandalsfrom my 2 yr old son. He wears an 8 in most shoes, so that's what I ordered, but they were way too big! By the time I returned them they were out of stock so I ordered these and they fit more true to size. So far we love them! He hasn't got to wear them to the creek to see just how slip resistant they are, and his feet seem to slip/move around more inside the sandal vs the velcroe sandals that cover the whole foot, hence the 4 star review :)
customer_reviews.author: Vatisha Carney

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, tell your momma hi!
customer_reviews.text: Such cute shoes. The 2 1/2 year old loved the color - PINK. I think she will get a lot of wear out of these this spring/summer seasons. A girl can never have enough cute shoes. I like the Teva brand so thought the children's version would be great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tranquility Girl

customer_reviews.title: Usually a lover but not this time
customer_reviews.text: Typically I love Teva sandals both for me and for my kids but unfortunately this sandal broke the first day of wear. My son put them on right out of the box and we headed to the river. He didn't wear them in the water; he only wore them to and from the car yet on our way home the back strap ripped right off. Of course I forgot to initiate a return in due time because we've been so busy so it's my loss. Just hoping Teva will improve the quality of their materials in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Diamond

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved them so much she wouldn't let me send them ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing chart not exactly accurate. Shoes are almost 1 in too BIG. My daughter loved them so much she wouldn't let me send them back and exchange them so we have dealt but I did measure her feet and compare to chart and they were still to big. Now that I know the shoes run big I will keep in mind in the future is order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my son’s 2nd pair of Hurricanes. They ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my son’s 2nd pair of Hurricanes. They are our go-to sandal (when he can’t wear flip flops). He is really picky about shoes and comfort and choose these every time.
customer_reviews.author: sbh919

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I bought these for my 4 year old so he could have a pair of sandals that are easy to put on and will stay on. Had little issue with rubbing but that went away once they were broken in. He is into everything (literally - everything) from the woods to the creek and these Teva's have so far held up very well!
customer_reviews.author: JV McGee

customer_reviews.title: I can almost always wear boys shoes comfortably, because I have fairly small feet (and love ...
customer_reviews.text: I can almost always wear boys shoes comfortably, because I have fairly small feet (and love saving the cash by wearing kids!). These run a bit small. Even after adjusting them they are pretty uncomfortable. Disappointed, as I followed the size chart. Too much of a hassle to return, though. Recommend sizing up a half size if you can. If your child has wider feet especially.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Super flexible soles and very grippy!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought it would be, the soles are way more flexible than original tevas and have better traction, super grippy! I bought these for me, and they fit my size womans 9 or eu40 size foot perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: We love tevas for our 3 little boys
customer_reviews.text: We love tevas for our 3 little boys. My son grew out if his size 7 last a few months ago, like toes almostly hanging out! So I bought size 8 last month and these are about the exact same size, just wider than the smaller size! We are keeping them because i have 2 other boys that can use them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Fullmer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a pair of these exact teva sandals every year for each of my boys. They have yet to break or wear out a pair. They are the only shoes they wear in the summer. They wear them in the dirt and the water and climbing and whatever else boys do. You cannot find better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LaurelP

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3 year old in the Monterey raspberry. I was surprised by how bright of a pink they are, love them! My daughter is so excited to have shoes she can put on herself. They're cozy for her and she can run in them. They run true to size. I will definitely be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: and he love them! He is 4
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 years old boy, and he love them! He is 4,5 Big kid size and I ordered 5 Big kid and they are just a little larger (less half a size or 5 mm) for his feet, which is better because he growing very fast. This sandals are very sturdy and rugged enough to stand a VERY active kid (mine one) and doesn't look like the rest (boring and horrible) models available on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Quintero

customer_reviews.title: The look was nice the sole itself a bit heavier than expected but ...
customer_reviews.text: The look was nice the sole itself a bit heavier than expected but the real problem was the size. My foot was lost in them. If I tied tighter, they hurt if looser they flopped around. After 3 wears decided they weren't for me. I am a true 7 in about 95% of most footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Marpin

customer_reviews.title: Adventure Sandals
customer_reviews.text: We took our kids on a four day spring trip to various beaches. These held up to beach walking, being submerged in water, rock climbing, tide pool exploring, hiking, etc. and have tons of life left. These are perfect for active people who are going to be on various terrain and need a waterproof supportive sandal.
customer_reviews.author: MiyazakiFan

customer_reviews.title: Son approved
customer_reviews.text: My son is very picky (11y) and he put them on after I made him try on once received and he actually kept them on. Then the other day we were heading out for errands and instead of socks and shoes in the dead of summer I saw he was sporting his new teva sandals. They are a nice color and fit as expected. I would have to say if he's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: RI_RN♡

customer_reviews.title: I like these for our 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: I like these for our 4 year old. This is our 4th sandals purchase from Teva, bc we like how comfy and durable they are. We've tried several types of their sandals for her through the years. Being able to adjust the width of her foot and ankles gave her a nice fit with these. We'll def purchase more when she goes up in size.
customer_reviews.author: H and KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: She is eight and so I feel like the look of these fits her age better than ...
customer_reviews.text: Due to the other reviews I expected these to run a tad small... which was true, but they will still work for my daughter through the summer. She has a narrow foot so being able to adjust the straps is very helpful. She is eight and so I feel like the look of these fits her age better than a pair of crocs or closed toe canvas shoe would.
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 16 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Shoes broke after 16 days of use. Not even hard use or daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E. Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable straps too short.
customer_reviews.text: The footbed ran a little small, but we could have made it work. The major problem was that the straps that close over the toes and around the leg are ridiculously short. Once latched, the toe strap barely even covered half of the velcro. A larger size won't fix the problem unless they change the lengths significantly. It's a nice shoe and I wish it would have worked for us, but it's just not a good fit because the adjustable straps are too short.
customer_reviews.author: Taylorsx7

customer_reviews.title: Hard sole, bot for adilts
customer_reviews.text: I really likes the color so tried buying them for an adult myself after wearing top models like Terra Fi for long years – did not work good. This model is super simple – the straps are sturdy and the sole is hard like rock. Maybe it works fine for kids with their low weight, but for an adults wearing in them might me a nightmare of hardness.
customer_reviews.author: Dasha Shigaeva

customer_reviews.title: nothing covers the hard plastic triangle on the inside, ...
customer_reviews.text: nothing covers the hard plastic triangle on the inside, near the pinkie toe. It chewed my daughters toe up badly enough that she refused to wear them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Kostner

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and well made. My 3 year old loves them. However, they are very true to size. My daughter needs an 8.5. I got an 8 because these don't come in half sizes and they are almost too small. Definitely bump up to the next size if your child is in between sizes. Also, it appears the boyish colors are sized for a boys foot. So if you buy a boyish color for a girl it may actually be a little big because it's a boy's size 8 not a girls size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the price. I have size 7 feet so the kids 5 fits great. But I have ordered these in the past and they were much better quality. These have zero arch support and the soles are way thin. Maybe the adult sizes are better made but the kids have all the fun colors. I definitely won't be wearing these for long walks like the other pairs I got before.
customer_reviews.author: kddove

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy sandals with minimal break in period
customer_reviews.text: Teva sandals a terrific for growing feet. Not too expensive but well built and sturdy. I got this for my 12yo before going on a beach vacation in the winter. Of course, his feet had grown and his older sandals did not fit! These fit well, there was no breaking in period and they are very easy to keep clean. I have no doubt that he will grow out of them before the end of the summer when these will still have plenty of use left to them.
customer_reviews.author: Iris74

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing kid sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 5 year old. He slipped SEVERAL times on wet surfaces which included pool side (at a waterpark), and in a play area. The sandals don't seem to have a grip. Although the size is as expected, it gave my kid a couple of shoe bites and the sandal remains uncomfortable to wear. I am very disappointed and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chh9

customer_reviews.title: I was sick of buying 20 sandals for my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of buying 20 sandals for my kids for them to fall apart in a few weeks. These are not much more and hold up the entire summer to the point where I can give them to my friends kids as hand me downs.
customer_reviews.author: Christine McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price! Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love the Teva Kids' Hurricane 3 Sandals. This will actually be our second pair. However, these do run small and a little narrow. I typically by my daughter size 8 toddler and had to return to get a size 9. The 8's fit, but there was no room to grow at all. These are great shoes for summer and school!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price! My eldest daughter (7) has these and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price! My eldest daughter (7) has these and her younger sister (5) wanted a matching pair...cue Amazon! Such a great price. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: We didn't like these. They ran small and the footbed was ...
customer_reviews.text: We didn't like these. They ran small and the footbed was hard and uncomfortable. We have an older style and we prefer those much better. The footbet is much softer and cushier-which my daughter really likes. We liked the silver color of these but that was about it. Back they went!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teva for the win, again!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3-year old son, and he loves them. He loves that he can put them on himself, and do the velcro himself. I did feel they were a little larger fit than I was expecting, but that's the beauty of the adjustable straps! Overall, very happy with the quality and comfort they give my child.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: My son loved these. I gave it 4 stars because they ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these. I gave it 4 stars because they did run a blister until his feet got used to the way they fit. It could have been because of the fact that he wore them wet.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked them a lot. She is 16 and usually wears women's 7 and 7.5 (depends of the shoe style and brand). We used the teva size chart in their website and measured her foot to find the right size which was really accurate. ordered youth 6 and they fit perfect. Good quality. She says they are really comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: work well!
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals! The perfect summer sandal for a 5 year old. It is not a problem for us that it does not have a closed toe (don't kids also run around barefoot?), and they are much easier to put on than most Keen closed-toe sandals.
customer_reviews.author: hylactor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are perfect for my narrow footed toddler! I've purchased at least 15 pairs of sandals before finding these! My toddler has very narrow feet and metatarsus adductus (feet shaped like a bean) and these have been awesome! They're very easy to clean and durable and they don't leave red marks after wearing all day. Well worth the money - I bought 2 pairs! She's in a 7 toddler in other shoes but I ordered a size up like suggested and she still has room to grow. I can't say enough good things about these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sterling Silver...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in metallic silver (my daughter's favorite color), in a size larger than her normal size..."These sandals are brilliantly made, fit perfectly, and they look fabulous on her feet...she loves them😍!
customer_reviews.author: MoMia

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a steal at $17, and the silver is cute, but the love ends there. These are not the same soles as adult sizes, so all day hiking for a woman who can wear them is a no-go. No arch support and just barely true to size, but big enough and comfy enough to keep for kicking around town.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: so not flat like most flip flops
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. And they have a little arch, so not flat like most flip flops. And the sole is comfy not hard. As for how they will stand up to her busyness, we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Kandee kelly

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and she has a little room to grow into ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute turquoise pattern. My 7 year old daughter loves them. They are very comfortable and she has a little room to grow into them this next year. Great all around shoe for playing or hiking or swimming in lake Powell.
customer_reviews.author: Runnin4me

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals for my daughter. They do rub a little at the ankle when she fastens them too tight, which is sort of easy to do because the top strap isn't very long. She did get a little sore from that, but we have been more careful to not fasten them too tight from then on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: Cool for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old lives in flip flops and loves these. He's been running around in these and seems to be equally comfortable in his new Tevas as he is in flip flops. Note that these are the more aggressively-soled sandals and not the flat-bottomed flip-flop-like sandals.
customer_reviews.author: TaiChiDadTX

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! The adjustable straps are great and keep the sandals securely on little feet. I feel much better about my toddler wearing these than flip-flops. Bonus: they are easy to clean. The sole is very flexible, which is great for my 2.5 year-old, running, climbing, etc. She loves the cute strawberry design too.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRowe24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for active kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter who loves wearing sandals but wants to run and jump in them. These are great for anyone whose kids love to splash in puddles too. My daughters love to splash around and these are comfy and dry fast for her.
customer_reviews.author: Photostar7980

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe that we picked up for a great price. Seems to fit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe that we picked up for a great price. Seems to fit on the small side. My daughter wears toddler size 7 shoes and we ordered size 8. It ended up being a perfect fit. When I say perfect I mean in 2 months she most likely won't fit in them.
customer_reviews.author: jay c

customer_reviews.title: they are great. Get them wet or keep them dry it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Teva's for over 20 years, they are great. Get them wet or keep them dry it doesn't matter they are the best. I have all of my kids wearing them as well. it is the go to shoe in the summer
customer_reviews.author: not my real name

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: 7 fits ladies 8.5 perfect feels nice same type bottom as my ladies sandals I loved last year but went out of stock
customer_reviews.author: H and d

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but lack of adjusting straps.
customer_reviews.text: There's not as much support to hold the heel into these sandals. It's been disappointing for my daughter who would like to wear them, but her heel slips to the side too much and she can't run in them. Very cute sandal. Wish the straps were adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kowal

customer_reviews.title: The straps are very good quality, very well made
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with Teva...I'm a Reef girl. These surprised me! The foot bed of the shoe is soft and squishy while the underside sole is firm and grippy! The straps are very good quality, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for high arches
customer_reviews.text: These sandals seem to be good quality. However, they are NOT meant for high arches! Flat footbed = no support. Velcro over top of foot barely covers itself. I gave them to a friend, who says they fit fine. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for her narrow feet because of the adjustable straps ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo daughter is so hard to fit for sandals and I was hesitant to try ordering since I thought we might be beginning a journey of a million returns. These were perfect for her narrow feet because of the adjustable straps and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: N. Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for my 20 month old
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for my 20 month old. Classic Teva design and same quality as the adult version. Thick sturdy rubber sole. We use ours for hiking, playing at the lake and everyday activities. We ordered toddler size 4 and it was a little bigger than other brand's (Striderite) size 4's but the straps keep them on her feet just fine and she'll have longer in them.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Held up great all summer
customer_reviews.text: Held up great all summer. My son wore them everyday. Will absolutely last through multiple children. So glad I found them here on amazon for half the price. I’m not picky on the color so just got the cheapest option. Will be buying another pair next summer for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes! Totally fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes! Totally fit as expected. My son has wide Fred Flintstone feet and they are perfect for him. Too bad he only wore them for a couple of weeks and left them behind at camp. If he had brought them home, I am sure they would have lasted for a very long time (we still have their predecessor in use, even though they are a bit short...)
customer_reviews.author: CoffeePlease

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great. The only drawback is the plastic bucket that tends to rub my little pinkie toe a bit, but that's probably because I have a weird pinkie toe, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: chetsbabe

customer_reviews.title: Good but Khombu's better and quarter of the price.
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves them, but they are expensive for what you get and are wearing much faster than the Khombu's I got for all of us for a quarted of the price. They are neat, but I would recommend the Khombu's first.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are narrow and don't have as much cushioned sole. I returned them. I'm spoiled with good fit Tevas. My last pair lasted 16 yrs. They were comfortable. These did not compare.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Sandals for the price of $19
customer_reviews.text: They are great sandals for kids who want something higher performance than normal cheap sandals. But be careful they seem to run a little bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy555

customer_reviews.title: A bit big, but nice.
customer_reviews.text: They were larger than expected but my daughter did grow into them by midsummer. They seemed comfortable, no blisters or anything. She wore them in the water too. They clean up easily in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: KatKor

customer_reviews.title: It's my fault I bought too large a size, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault I bought too large a size, but my issue is the triangular piece that joins below the toes rubs and hurts if walking for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M. Freschi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. They're lightweight. There's less arch support than I expected (the soles are quite flat). I have pretty high arches, so I hope this doesn't become a problem. The straps are well made. The velcro straps are functional. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Winner for toddlers and kids
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect sandals. Light, airy, ok to get wet, easy to put on and take off. They're just wonderful. Wish the strap in front of the ankle was angled up a tad but that's small stuff. I'm gonna get them in every size. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive shoe for a long day of walking
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and our upcoming Disney World trip. I wanted her to have a sandal option that would be more supportive than a flip flop. She loved these. Pretty color and comfortable enough for those long long days.
customer_reviews.author: Acorn2010

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute. The only issue was that my 6 year old complained that they hurt her feet very shortly after wearing them. They rubbed her little pinky toes very red. We even tried the toe strap at different tightness.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: These are great sandals. They don't have the same amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals. They don't have the same amount of arch support as a pair we ordered a few years ago. My three year old son wears these all day without complaining. He can even put them on by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not new liked described ! They look used and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Just received my package, and I can say I'm completely unhappy with them. They didn't come in its original box they only came on a plastic bag. The bottom of the sandals have wear to them and have dirt. The pink part of them also have dirt and you can tell the little marks of the foot prints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are my son's favorite sandals. These are his second pair, and they can take a beating! The Velcro lasts, the tread lasts, the comfort lasts. They run a smidge small, but I always order his normal shoe size. Highly recommend these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Moose & Donuts

customer_reviews.title: Solid footwear for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great little sandals. Easy to adjust, easy to clean after lots of time in the elements, dry quickly after spraying em off. They do exactly what they're supposed to, so I'd definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit him fine, but the strap in the back only adjusts ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit him fine, but the strap in the back only adjusts in one direction. We couldn't tighten it and his foot kept slipping forward. They just fit really odd and they were not adjustable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Swenlin

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal for outdoor, water activity. Great price too. Silt and sand wash out easily unlike some closed toe varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. Great piece of cushion at the heel and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Great piece of cushion at the heel and a lot of arch support. Very well made and they look adorable on my child’s foot! I will be ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: M.Moore

customer_reviews.title: OUT-OF-THE-BOX ISSUES...
customer_reviews.text: The Tevas fit completely different compared to previous Teva sandals I've owned; I do not remember ever having issues with the fit, strap location and length, instant discomfort when wearing.... This is the second pair of new Tevas I've purchased and the issues are similar even though completely different Teva sandals. It is frustrating when experiencing 'out of the box' issues rather than 'out of the box" ready-set-GO, I'M JUST SAYIN' : (
customer_reviews.author: lynn mcewen

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome they might be just a pinch big but if ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome they might be just a pinch big but if I tighten the Velcro they are great... I have been breaking them in for an upcoming trip to Thailand for a month and they are feeling great so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Usually love Teva. This particular sandal has weird round metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Usually love Teva. This particular sandal has weird round metal ring on side. It hurt my sons foot too much. Couldnt get one day out of it, Annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This sandal fell apart after 2 weeks of use. Very disappointing because it is a good shoe in every other way, size, fit, comfort, grip etc. Such a shame that it is built sturdily.
customer_reviews.author: freym

customer_reviews.title: Size seems a little big, otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son in same size as shoes he wears, they are almost a full size larger. He will grow into them so it's ok, and he loves them. Great grip on wet rocks in rivers and creeks.
customer_reviews.author: ISO1600

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Tevas my first pair lasted almost 15 years. They just fell apart last year I've been wearing these almost everyday this summer and I walk about 7 to 10 miles a day and they are in fantastic condition still!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kalik

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thinks these shoes are so comfortable and the color was great. Cheaper then comparable for a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone way done
customer_reviews.text: Teva Hurricane was a fabulous sandal. They changed. This has a much thinner sole, and the plastic connector is rubbing on my daughter's pinkie toe. It used to be covered in fabric. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these shoes! This is my daughter's second pair. They hold up well, wash nicely, and are comfy for her. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kbailey

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes in the summer. He loves that he can still run in them and not have to worry about them sliding off. And much more comfortable than Chacos.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like these, but my 5 yo said it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these, but my 5 yo said it was hurting her toe where the triangular plastic connects the straps near her pinkie. But the quality was great and fit perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: they are SUPER water and beach and playing and river and EVERYTHING ...
customer_reviews.text: teva delivers with these sandals. ALWAYS. we started with an infant size 3 years ago and now are onto the toddler size 8. they are SUPER water and beach and playing and river and EVERYTHING summer shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and services.........
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Excellent Beautiful My son loves it, I am happy I bought it, delivered on time, well packaged with good quality.... Will buy more and I recommend to others, it worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mo-Mo

customer_reviews.title: Always pleased with Teva shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always pleased with Teva shoes. My toddler runs around in the dirt/mud/water/rocks, etc. and I just spray them off and set them aside for the next adventure. These shoes never fray or become damaged, my kids just outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: EloiseJenkins

product_meta.title: Teva Hurricane 3 Sport Sandal (Toddler/Little Kid/Big Kid)
